name: IpUtils
brief:
General utility functions for Ipopt

Provides platform-independent utility functions:
- Min/Max template functions for up to 4 arguments
- IsFiniteNumber() for NaN/Inf detection
- CpuTime(), SysTime(), WallclockTime() for profiling
- IpRandom01() for random number generation
- Snprintf() for safe formatted output
- Compare_le() for numerical comparison with tolerance
- Signal handling for graceful interrupt
see: IpTypes.hpp for Number and Index type definitions
